mapper.select: SELECT S.SCHEDULE_ID , S.TITLE , S.START_TIME , S.END_TIME , S.MEETING_STATUS , US.STATUS FROM TBL_SCHEDULE S JOIN TBL_USER_SCHEDULE US ON S.SCHEDULE_ID = US.SCHEDULE_ID WHERE US.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT S.SCHEDULE_ID , S.TITLE , S.CONTENT , S.START_TIME , S.END_TIME , S.UPDATE_TIME , S.PUBLIC_STATUS , S.SCHEDULE_REPEAT_ID , S.REPEAT_ORDER , S.MEETING_STATUS , S.MEETINGROOM_ID , S.USER_ID , U.USERNAME FROM TBL_SCHEDULE S LEFT JOIN TBL_USER U ON S.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE S.USER_ID = #{userId} OR S.SCHEDULE_ID IN ( SELECT US.SCHEDULE_ID FROM TBL_USER_SCHEDULE US WHERE US.USER_ID = #{userId} AND US.STATUS = 'ATTEND' )

SELECT -- 일정 기본 정보 S.SCHEDULE_ID, S.TITLE, S.CONTENT, S.START_TIME, S.END_TIME, S.UPDATE_TIME, S.PUBLIC_STATUS, S.MEETING_STATUS, S.MEETINGROOM_ID,
-- 소유자 정보 U.USER_ID AS OWNER_USER_ID, U.USERNAME AS OWNER_USERNAME,
-- 내 알림 시간 US2.NOTIFICATION_TIME AS MY_NOTIFICATION_TIME,
-- 참석자 정보 US.USER_ID AS USER_ID_FROM_PARTICIPANT, UP.USERNAME AS USERNAME_FROM_USER, US.STATUS, US.NOTIFICATION_TIME AS PARTICIPATION_NOTIFICATION_TIME FROM TBL_SCHEDULE S -- 소유자 정보 (필수) INNER JOIN TBL_USER U ON S.USER_ID = U.USER_ID -- 내 알림 시간 (옵션) LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_SCHEDULE US2 ON S.SCHEDULE_ID = US2.SCHEDULE_ID AND US2.USER_ID = #{userId} -- 참석자 정보 (옵션) LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_SCHEDULE US ON S.SCHEDULE_ID = US.SCHEDULE_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USER UP ON US.USER_ID = UP.USER_ID WHERE S.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}

SELECT S.SCHEDULE_ID , S.TITLE , S.CONTENT , S.START_TIME , S.END_TIME , S.UPDATE_TIME , S.PUBLIC_STATUS , S.SCHEDULE_REPEAT_ID , S.REPEAT_ORDER , S.MEETING_STATUS , S.MEETINGROOM_ID , S.USER_ID FROM TBL_SCHEDULE S WHERE S.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}

SELECT S.SCHEDULE_ID , S.TITLE , S.CONTENT , S.START_TIME , S.END_TIME , S.UPDATE_TIME , S.MEETING_STATUS , S.MEETINGROOM_ID , S.USER_ID , OWNER.USERNAME AS username -- 일정 소유자의 이름 , US.USER_ID AS user_id_from_participant , PARTICIPANT.USERNAME AS username_from_user -- 참여자의 이름 , US.STATUS AS status , US.NOTIFICATION_TIME AS notification_time -- 알림 시간 FROM TBL_SCHEDULE S LEFT JOIN TBL_USER OWNER -- 일정 소유자와 조인 ON S.USER_ID = OWNER.USER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_SCHEDULE US ON S.SCHEDULE_ID = US.SCHEDULE_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USER PARTICIPANT -- 참여자와 조인 ON US.USER_ID = PARTICIPANT.USER_ID WHERE US.USER_ID = #{userId} AND DATE(S.START_TIME) = CURDATE() ORDER BY S.START_TIME
